dublin_core.dcvalue: Smartphone video capture and transmission to the Web contributes to data pollution In contrast mammalian eyes sense all capture only significant events allowing us vividly recall the causalities Likewise in our videos we wish to skip redundancies and keep only significantly differences as determined by real time local medium filters We construct a Picture Index PI of one s center of gravity changes among zeros no changes as Motion Organized Sparseness MOS Only non overlapping time ordered PI pair is admitted in the outer product Associative Memory AM Another outer product between PI and its image builds Hetero AM HAM for fault tolerant retrievals
